text: Behzad Abdi (born 1973, Tehran, Iran) is an Iranian composer of opera, film, and television music.CD Booklet notes accompanying the CD Behad Abdi: Rumi, Naxos,CD Catalogue No. 8.660424-25, p.8 Abdi is based in Kyiv, Ukraine. == References == Category:1973 births Category:Living people
title: Behzad Abdi
